subject: Re: [junit] The Class Loader fix
msgSnippet: I have forgotten the guy s name but I recall he said he posted it to the JUnit patches area.
messageBody:
I have forgotten the guy's name but I recall he said he posted it to
the JUnit patches area.

On Aug 24, 2004, at 11:07 AM, J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> I'm surprised...
>
> Everyone was yelling about the big class loader defect in JUnit, but
> no-one wants to talk to me about it! Someone here has a fix, so lay it
> on me!
>
> Thanks.
> --
> J. B. Rainsberger,
> Diaspar Software Services

> Let's write software that people understand
